name: icona
description: All in one icon Library from figma to development

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run generate
scripts.publish:local: node -r dotenv/config -e "require('child_process').execSync('npm config set //registry.npmjs.org/:_authToken ' + process.env.NPM_TOKEN, {stdio: 'inherit'}); require('child_process').execSync('npm publish', {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run generate && npm run publish:local
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run generate && npm run publish:local
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run generate && npm run publish:local
